00016 #ifndef _AVR_I2C_H
00017 #define _AVR_I2C_H
00018 
00019 #define avr_i2c_set_brr( new_twbr )     TWBR = new_twbr
00020 #define avr_i2c_start_condition()       TWCR |= (1 << TWSTA)
00021 #define avr_i2c_stop_condition()        TWCR |= (1 << TWSTO)
00022 #define avr_i2c_interrupt_enable()      TWCR |= (1 << TWIE)
00023 #define avr_i2c_interrupt_disable()     TWCR &= ~(1 << TWIE)
00024 #define avr_i2c_enable()                TWCR |= (1 << TWEN)
00025 #define avr_i2c_disable()               TWCR &= ~(1 << TWEN)
00026 #define avr_i2c_get_status()            (TWSR & ~3)
00027 #define avr_i2c_put_byte( new_byte )    TWDR = new_byte
00028 #define avr_i2c_get_byte()              TWDR
00029 #define avr_i2c_set_slave_addr( new_slave )  TWAR = (new_slave << 1)
00030 #define avr_i2c_clear_int_flag()        TWCR |= (1 << TWINT)
00031 #define avr_i2c_check_int_flag()        TWCR & (1 << TWINT)
00032 #define avr_i2c_enable_general_call()   TWAR |= (1 << TWGCE)
00033 #define avr_i2c_disable_general_call()  TWAR &= ~(1 << TWGCE)
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 #define I2C_ENABLE_ACK 0
00038 #define I2C_DISABLE_ACK 1
00039 #define I2C_DEST_ADDR 3
00040 #define I2C_SLAVE_ADDR 4
00041 #define I2C_SET_BRR 5
00042 
00043 #define I2C_IDLE 0
00044 #define I2C_READING 1
00045 #define I2C_WRITING 2
00046 
00047 
00048 //Status Codes for Master Transmitter Mode
00049 #define START 0x08 //A START condition has been transmitted.
00050 #define START_REPEAT  0x10 //A repeated START condition has been transmitted.
00051 #define MT_SLA_ACK 0x18 //SLA+W has been transmitted; ACK has been received
00052 #define MT_SLA_NACK 0x20 //SLA+W has been transmitted; NOT ACK received
00053 #define MT_DATA_ACK 0x28 //DATA has been transmitted, ACK has been received
00054 #define MT_DATA_NACK 0x30 //DATA has been transmitted, NOT ACK received
00055 #define MT_ARB_LOST 0x38 //Arbitration lost in SLA+W or data bytes
00056 #define MT_DATA_DONE 0x01
00057 
00058 //Status Codes for Master Receiver Mode
00059 #define MR_SLA_ACK 0x40 //SLA+R has been transmitted, ACK has been received
00060 #define MR_SLA_NACK 0x48 //SLAR+R has been transmitted, NOT ACK received
00061 #define MR_DATA_ACK 0x50 //DATA byte has been received, ACK returned
00062 #define MR_DATA_NACK 0x58 //DATA has been received, NOT ACK returned
00063 
00064 //Status Codes for Slave Receiver Mode
00065 #define OWN_SLAW_RECEIVED_ACK 0x60 //Own SLA+W has been received; ACK returned
00066 #define ARBITRATION_LOST_SLARW 0x68 //Arbitration lost in SLA+R/W as master; own SLA+W has been received; ACK has been returned
00067 #define GENERAL_ADDR_RECEIVED 0x70 //General call address has been received; ACK has been returned
00068 #define ARBITRATION_LOST_SLARW_GEN 0x78 //Arbitration lost in SLA+R/W as master; General call address has been received; ACK has been returned
00069 #define PREV_ADDR_DATA_RECEIVED_ACK 0x80 //Previously addressed with own SLA+W; data has been received ACK has been returned
00070 #define PREV_ADDR_DATA_RECEIVED_NACK 0x88 //Previously addressed with own SLA+W; data has been received; NOT ACK has been returned
00071 #define PREV_GENERAL_ADDR_DATA_RECEIVED_ACK 0x90 //Previously addressed with general call; data has been received; ACK has been returned
00072 #define PREV_GENERAL_ADDR_DATA_RECEIVED_NACK 0x98 //Previously addressed with general call; data has been received; NOT ACK has been returned
00073 #define STOP_REPEATED_START 0xA0 //A STOP condition or repeated START condition has been received while still addressed as slave
00074 
00075 //Status Codes for Slave Transmitter Mode
00076 #define SLAR_RECEIVED_ACK 0xA8 //Own SLA+R has been received; ACK has been returned.
00077 #define ARBITRATION_LOST_SLARW_ACK 0xB0 //Arbitration lost in SLA+R/W as master; own SLA+R has been received; ACK has been returned
00078 #define SLAVE_DATA_XMITTED_ACK 0xB8 //Data byte in TWDR has been transmitted; ACK hs been received
00079 #define SLAVE_DATA_XMITTED_NACK 0xC0 //Data byte in TWDR has been transmitted; NOT ACK has been received
00080 #define LAST_BYTE_XMITTED 0xC8 //Last data byte in TWDR has been transmitted (TWEA = "0"); ACK has been received
00081 
00082 //Miscellaneous States
00083 #define NO_RELEVANT_STATE 0xF8 //No relevant state information available; TWINT="0"
00084 #define BUS_ERROR 0x00 //Bus error due to an illegal START or STOP condition
00085 
00086 #define I2C_MT 0  //master transmitter
00087 #define I2C_MR 1  //master receiver
00088 #define I2C_ST 2  //slave transmitter
00089 #define I2C_SR 3  //slave receiver
00090 
00093 void avr_i2c_init();
00094 
00095 #endif
